text: Khadia is a genus of plants in the family Aizoaceae. Some species under this genus include: * Khadia acutipetala * Khadia alticola * Khadia beswickii (L.Bolus) N.E.Br. * Khadia borealis * Khadia carolinensis * Khadia media * Khadia nationae * Khadia nelsonii Category:Aizoaceae Category:Aizoaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Khadia
